alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 8:50PM PDT until March 28 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT TUESDAY FOR THE BASE OF THE NORTHERN BLUE MOUNTAINS OF OREGON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected for the base of the northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. Strongest winds will occur near Cabbage Hill and the Cayuse area. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
